item.description: Meet WWE superstar Alberto Del Rio, future WWE talent in South Florida WWE NXT Tour makes West Palm Beach debut on Oct. 26 WWE NXT conducts its inaugural show in West Palm Beach on Friday, Oct. 26. item.title: 未来四周的NXT剧透（我那个去！）
item.description: 我懂的，Sheamus vs. Alberto Del Rio for WHC这种东西肿么会在NXT播出呢？！所以，必须只是场吸引眼球的dark main event。至于结果么，你懂的……
